ygData.subject: RE: Red Headband Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: In my opinion, at the early levels, through about 20, they are worth it, as the armor available for the head and waist is limited at best. As you progress,
ygData.messageBody:
In my opinion, at the early levels, through about 20, they are worth it, as
the armor available for the head and waist is limited at best. As you
progress, however, you will find that armor exists that will be of more use
than the small stat boosts the headbands and sashes give. I personally have
traded in my orange/red sash for a thick leather apron, and am saving all my
coin for the executioners hood. Until I get the hood, the red headband will
suffice.

Praelor Dileasai

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Imari J. A. Dellimore [SMTP:ijad@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 3:47 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Red Headband Quest
>
> From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>
>
> Are the headbands and sash quests worth it? Is the Ac/stat bonus merit
> the time it takes to get these items? I was just wondering because I met a
> level 35 monk who says she never did any of the quests and feels that the
> items given are not worth the trouble.
>
>
>
>
